name: SGBS Unnati Foundation
briefDescription: SGBS Unnati Foundation located in Bangalore, Karnataka.SGBS Unnati Foundation a Not for Profit Organization, registered under Section 8 of Companies Act with Registration number U80102KA2011NPL061201 and having its registered Office at #1, Temple road, 4th main, 4th cross ,Sadananda Nagar , NGEF Layout, Bangalore -560038.We are currently operating & managing close to 30 centers, across PAN India, we have trained & placed close to 25,000 youth.Unnati Training programme focuses on Underprivileged youth aged between 18yrs to 25 years of both boys & girls,who are less educated, semi literate, literate, unemployed, so on . With 300 hours of vocational training in 50 days,training on Spoken English, Basic Computers, Life Skills, Values so on.Once the training is completed each & every youth is guaranteed with 100% job placement. Our Vision is to train & employ close to 1 million youth within a decade.
